attributes.action: Petition to hold a Scottish Referendum to repeal the Scotland Act
attributes.additional_details: The Scottish people would decide at the ballot box.
attributes.background: The Referendum question would be, “Should the Scotland Act be repealed

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Hold a referendum on the continuation of devolution in Scotland
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606015
